data.expected_outcome: Normalize evaluation scores 0-5, add tokens_bucket enum, cap confidence 0.05-0.99
data.actual_outcome: Evaluations show avg_outcome_score 5.0/5 scale working. Confidence capping in place. Grade distribution functional.
data.next_action: Use more varied grades (not just A) to test full scale
data.notes: Schema refinements implemented. 352/353 evals are Grade A - need more real variance to fully test scale.
